news.title: David Tepper sends scathing letter to Whirlpool for destroying shareholder value, pushes for changes
news.summary: Tepper says he watched with "a certain astonishment" as the company issued equity. He called it a large and unnecessary dilution of shareholders.

news.title: 5 takeaways from Trump's State of Union address
news.summary: Democrats are nipping at the heels of the incumbent Republicans for control of Congress in the 2026 midterms. Democrats are hoping to take control of the House of Representatives for the first time.

news.title: David Ellison has a rocky history at the box office. Buying Warner Bros. could fix that
news.summary: Only five of Skydance's features to date — three of them starring Tom Cruise — have generated more than $200 million domestically. The company's first film, "The Matrix," was released in 2004.

news.title: Nvidia’s new AI system Vera Rubin is 10 times more efficient than its predecessor — here’s a first look
news.summary: CNBC got an exclusive first look at Vera Rubin, Nvidia's next AI system. It's due to ship in the second half of the year.

news.title: Mortgage rates hit lowest level in nearly 4 years, but homebuyers are still stuck on the sidelines
news.summary: Mortgage rates dropped to the lowest level since 2022 last week. Demand from homebuyers declined as well, as they continue to struggle with affordability.

news.title: ‘I am fearful’: My ailing relative is being forced into assisted living. What can I do?
news.summary: “My relative also has no idea what they are being charged for these services,” she said. “My relatives also have no idea.”

news.title: HSBC reports a beat and a raise as it leapfrogs Wells Fargo by market cap
news.summary: HSBC’s guidance for 2026 is pushing analysts to raise their stock-price estimates by around 6%. HSBC is expected to report a 6% rise in its share price by 2026.

news.title: ‘I spend $7,500 a month’: I’m 47, earn $260K, and have $3 million. Can I retire at 50?
news.summary: “I own a home worth $520,000 and do not have a mortgage on it,” she says. “I’m not going to let that get in the way of my dreams.”

news.title: Why this investor says you can make good money off software stocks — if you trade them like telephone directories
news.summary: Deep value investor Lee Roach is looking at beaten-down software stocks for the first time ever. Roach says he's looking at software stocks as a potential takeover target.

news.title: Why more CEOs are taking a page from Elon Musk and chatting directly with customers
news.summary: Some corporate watchers question if this is just a PR move. Executives say it's all about learning how to better run their businesses.
